name: grape-ape
description: A funky dark purple and neon green theme, with somewhat low contrast for easy-on-the-eyes coding. A hybrid of the [Tokyo Night](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=enkia.tokyo-night) extension theme and the [Twilight Sparkle](https://themes.vscode.one/theme/nanoparsec/LQrfjHCe) color theme found at [https://themes.vscode.one](https://themes.vscode.one/theme/nanoparsec/LQrfjHCe)
